mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_extendinfo (userId, logo, score, realName, sex, birthday, tall, weight, nation, politics, marry, contactPhone, contactEmail, idCard, residence, location, nowStatus, wishType, wishBusiness, wishJob, wishLocation, wishSalary, collegeName, specialities, graduationTime, collegeType, diplomas, degree, classDuty, studentDuty, scholarship, scholarshipRange, awards, awardsRange, awardsDes, internProject, internTime, internDuty, internDesc, hobby, honor, assessment, createTimeStamp, lastUpdateTimeStamp, isDel) values (#{userId}, #{logo}, #{score}, #{realName}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{tall}, #{weight}, #{nation}, #{politics}, #{marry}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{idCard}, #{residence}, #{location}, #{nowStatus}, #{wishType}, #{wishBusiness}, #{wishJob}, #{wishLocation}, #{wishSalary}, #{collegeName}, #{specialities}, #{graduationTime}, #{collegeType}, #{diplomas}, #{degree}, #{classDuty}, #{studentDuty}, #{scholarship}, #{scholarshipRange}, #{awards}, #{awardsRange}, #{awardsDes}, #{internProject}, #{internTime}, #{internDuty}, #{internDesc}, #{hobby}, #{honor}, #{assessment}, unix_timestamp(now()), unix_timestamp(now()), 0)
mapper.update:
UPDATE user_extendinfo
AND logo=#{logo},
AND score=#{score},
AND realName=#{realName},
AND sex=#{sex},
AND birthday=#{birthday},
AND tall=#{tall},
AND weight=#{weight},
AND nation=#{nation},
AND politics=#{politics},
AND marry=#{marry},
AND contactPhone=#{contactPhone},
AND contactEmail=#{contactEmail},
AND idCard=#{idCard},
AND residence=#{residence},
AND location=#{location},
AND nowStatus=#{nowStatus},
AND wishType=#{wishType},
AND wishBusiness=#{wishBusiness},
AND wishJob=#{wishJob},
AND wishLocation=#{wishLocation},
AND wishSalary=#{wishSalary},
AND collegeName=#{collegeName},
AND specialities=#{specialities},
AND graduationTime=#{graduationTime},
AND collegeType=#{collegeType},
AND diplomas=#{diplomas},
AND degree=#{degree},
AND classDuty=#{classDuty},
AND studentDuty=#{studentDuty},
AND scholarship=#{scholarship},
AND scholarshipRange=#{scholarshipRange},
AND awards=#{awards},
AND awardsRange=#{awardsRange},
AND awardsDes=#{awardsDes},
AND internProject=#{internProject},
AND internTime=#{internTime},
AND internDuty=#{internDuty},
AND internDesc=#{internDesc},
AND hobby=#{hobby},
AND honor=#{honor},
AND assessment=#{assessment},
AND lastUpdateTimeStamp=unix_timestamp(now())
userId = #{userId}
